Data Host Direct can now pronounce, our VPS nodes have RAID-1! But what exactly is RAID-1? RAID-1 is hard drive mirroring, each file and each folder is mirrored over to the other hard drive, in case one fails, and if it fails, you don't know! There is no downtime!

How often does RAID-1 mirror?

RAID-1 is constantly mirroring, it's not like a backup where it copies every night, RAID-1 is copying over every second of the day.
